$PQEFF tendered my newly acquired bought-on-the-dip 2/1 shares this evening and Schwab has updated their acknowledgment page to reflect an update to February 25 tender submit deadline. I've noted that's a Friday and Feb 28 is a Monday. Perhaps we'll get funded by March 4.
$PQEFF Here is my email back to Kingsdale
created_at: let’s see what they say: Does Kingsdale/Viston expect to press release an update before the end of February when the remaining filing procedures have been completed? Aka when the only real remaining step in the process is determining the final tendered amount of shares? Does Kingsdale/Viston have access to the total number of shares currently held by brokers (such as my shares at RBC) and have at least a good estimate of how close to 50% (or even 90%) you are to the goal? This information (how many shares have indirectly been tendered aka tendered by the holder but not officially by the broker) could be very useful in swaying any on the fence shareholders who are currently spreading doubt about the offer on message boards. They often site the 144M shares tendered even though many people know that doesn’t include most broker held shares that number is still used to spread doubt. Thanks for your time.
